extensionName.message: Google Business Profile ID Extractor - Easy Copy

extensionDescription.message: This extension extracts Business Profile IDs from all Google Maps listings, making it easy to copy and use. No need to inspect code or dig through URLs. Features: Auto-detects Profile IDs, One-click copy, Fast and lightweight, Works with all Maps pages.

placeIdCopied.description: Notification shown when ID is copied to clipboard

copyButton.description: Text shown on the copy button before clicking

copiedButton.description: Text shown on the copy button after clicking

noPlaceIdFound.message: No Business Profile ID found on this page
noPlaceIdFound.description: Message shown when no ID is found
